SEARCH
Package com.dua3.meja.ui

Interface SheetView

All Known Implementing Classes:
FxSheetView, SwingSheetView
public interface SheetView
The SheetView interface represents a user interface view of a spreadsheet. Implementing classes define the behaviors and functionality for displaying and interacting with the sheet.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    SheetView.Actions
    Actions for key bindings.
    static enum 
    SheetView.Quadrant
    Represents the quadrant of a sheet view.
    static final record 
    SheetView.SheetArea
    Defines a rectangular area of cells in a sheet.

    The maximum allowable width for a column in the sheet view, expressed in pixels.

  • Field Details

    • MAX_COLUMN_WIDTH

      static final double MAX_COLUMN_WIDTH
      The maximum allowable width for a column in the sheet view, expressed in pixels. This value serves as an upper limit to ensure consistent rendering and layout alignment in the visual representation of the sheet.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • getSheet

      default Sheet getSheet()
      Get the sheet for this view.
      Returns:
      the sheet

    • scrollToCurrentCell

      void scrollToCurrentCell()
      Scroll the currently selected cell into view.

    • setCurrentCell

      default boolean setCurrentCell(int rowNum, int colNum)
      Set current row and column.
      Parameters:
      rowNum - number of row to be set
      colNum - number of column to be set
      Returns:
      true if the current logical cell changed

    • setEditable

      default void setEditable(boolean editable)
      Enable/disable sheet editing.
      Parameters:
      editable - true to allow editing

    • stopEditing

      void stopEditing(boolean commit)
      End edit mode for the current cell.
      Parameters:
      commit - true if the content of the edited cell is to be updated

    • getDelegate

      SheetViewDelegate getDelegate()
      Retrieves the delegate responsible for handling the sheet view's operations and interactions.
      Returns:
      the SheetViewDelegate that manages various operations for the sheet view

    • repaintCell

      void repaintCell(Cell cell)
      Repaints the specified cell in the sheet view.
      Parameters:
      cell - the cell to repaint.

    • updateContent

      void updateContent()
      Refreshes the content of the sheet view. This method is responsible for updating the display to reflect any changes made to the underlying data or structure of the sheet. It ensures that the current state of the sheet is accurately represented in the view.

    • focusView

      void focusView()
      Requests focus for the current view, bringing it to the foreground and ensuring that it is ready to receive user input.

    • getLocale

      Locale getLocale()
      Retrieve the current locale settings for this sheet view.
      Returns:
      the locale associated with this sheet view

    • getDisplayScale

      com.dua3.utility.math.geometry.Scale2f getDisplayScale()
      Retrieves the scale factor for displaying content in the sheet view.
      Returns:
      the display scale as a Scale2f object which represents the scale factors for both X and Y axes.

    • copyToClipboard

      void copyToClipboard()
      Copies the currently selected cell's content to the system clipboard.

    • showSearchDialog

      void showSearchDialog()
      Displays a search dialog that allows users to search for specific content within the sheet.

    • startEditing

      void startEditing()
      Initiates the editing mode for the currently selected cell in the sheet. This method prepares the cell for input, allowing the user to modify its content. If the sheet or the current cell is not editable, this method may have no effect.

    • moveHome

      default void moveHome()
      Moves the selection rectangle to the top-left cell in the sheet. This action typically aligns the view to the beginning of the data set.

    • moveEnd

      default void moveEnd()
      Move the selection rectangle to the bottom right cell of the sheet.

    • move

      default void move(Direction direction)
      Moves the view in the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction to move the view, which can be NORTH, EAST, SOUTH, or WEST

    • movePage

      default void movePage(Direction direction)
      Moves the current page in the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction to move the page, must be one of the following: NORTH, EAST, SOUTH, or WEST.
